md:
giải nghĩa từ "spiced" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Spiced (verb) /spaɪsd/:
	+ Meaning: to add spices to something, especially food or drink, to give it a particular flavor.
	+ Vietnamese: ướp gia vị, thêm gia vị.
	+ Example sentence: She spiced up the soup with some cumin and chili powder.
	+ Related words: spice, seasoning, flavor, aromatic.
	+ Antonyms: unspiced, plain.

* Spiced (adjective) /spaɪsd/:
	+ Meaning: having a strong or pleasant flavor because of spices.
	+ Vietnamese: có gia vị, thơm ngon.
	+ Example sentence: The spiced tea was a perfect remedy for the cold winter night.
	+ Related words: aromatic, flavorful, savory, pungent.
	+ Antonyms: unspiced, bland, tasteless.

Note: The verb "spice" can also mean to make something more interesting or exciting, but this meaning is not directly related to the meaning of "spiced" as an adjective.

Note: The verb "spice" can also mean to make something more interesting or exciting, but this meaning is not directly related to the meaning of "spiced" as an adjective.
